title: The Droppin Well, Part1/2: Episode 211
description:
It was 11:15pm on the evening of 6 December 1982 when the bomb went off in the Droppin Well bar in Ballykelly, Northern Ireland.  The INLA bomb killed 6 civilians and 11 British soldiers. 

In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast I tell the story of what happened on that terrible day.
